General.Name: GO Element Co. Ltd.
General.Description: Go Element Co., Ltd. engages in the development and supply of parts, materials, and related technologies for monitoring of production process of semiconductor materials in South Korea. The company provides NEO canisters; level sensors, such as point level, bottom-up, stick, and in-line liquid sensors; NEO vaporizers; degassers; heaters; and thermostats. It also offers aluminum and alloy, titanium, copper and tantalum, and back metals, as well as caniter handling systems. The company was founded in 2005 and is headquartered in Anseong, South Korea.
